name: py-pyscf

description:
PySCF is a collection of electronic structure programs powered by
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-h5py
dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
Arm Compiler combines the optimized tools and libraries from Arm with a
modern LLVM-based compiler framework.

dependencies.name: libcint
dependencies.description: Library for analytical Gaussian integrals for quantum chemistry.

dependencies.name: libxc

Libxc is a library of exchange-correlation functionals for density-
functional theory.

dependencies.name: xcfun
dependencies.description: Exchange-Correlation functionals with arbitrary order derivatives.
